dcterms:creator: J. Wu
H. He
L. Lin
Z. Cai
P. Cheng
X. Tang
dcterms:description: The GAMMA dataset contains 200 fundus images collected from multiple types of equipment, inducing diverse image resolutions that range from 1956 × 1934 to 2992 × 2000. It is used for glaucoma classification, OD/OC segmentation, and fovea localization.
dcterms:title: GAMMA

dcterms:creator: J. Orlando
S. Holm
dcterms:description: The REFUGE dataset consists of 400 images for training, 400 for validation, and 400 for testing, with a resolution of 2124 × 2056 for training data and 1634 × 1634 for validation and testing data. It is used for evaluating automated methods for glaucoma assessment from fundus photographs.
dcterms:title: REFUGE

dcterms:creator: D. J. J. Farnell
H. He
L. Lin
Z. Cai
P. Cheng
X. Tang
dcterms:description: The PALM dataset is provided by the ISBI2019 Pathologic Myopia Ophthalmology Competition organizers. It contains 800 training images and 400 testing images, with image resolutions of either 1444 × 1444 or 2124 × 2056. There is no ground truth segmentation for OC.
dcterms:title: PALM
